CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 座位；席位；位置；（衣物的）臀部；底座；（自行车、摩托车等的）鞍座；（机器或设备的）支架；乡村宅第；议会议员选区
能容纳…人；可坐…人；向…提供座位

synonym.mean: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 为…领座；为…提供座位（seat的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多用作不及物动词，用作及物动词时，可与seat换用。
及物动词，常与反身代词连用，常用过去分词seated形式。

word_group.brief_definition: 担任负责人；处于统领地位
台边前排席位；观看（或监视）的有利位置

bilingual.source: Because he thinks it is his seat.
bilingual.target: 因为他认为那是他的座位。
阿卜杜拉从座位上跳了起来。

bilingual.source: Dave could not find a seat in the room.
bilingual.target: 戴夫在房间里找不到座位。

bilingual.source: She tumbled down into the pilot's seat.
bilingual.target: 她跌坐在驾驶员的座位上。

bilingual.source: Lee got up from his seat and walked over.
bilingual.target: 李从座位上站起来走过去。

bilingual.source: This seat is not as comfortable as that one.
bilingual.target: 这个座位没有那个舒服。

bilingual.source: Mohan tumbled out of his seat onto the road.
bilingual.target: 莫汉从座位上摔到了路上。

bilingual.source: Why is the elderly man sitting in Tom's seat?
bilingual.target: 为什么老人坐在汤姆的座位上？

list.abstract: 西亚特（Seat）是西班牙最大的汽车公司，1950年成立于巴塞罗那。1983年德国大众汽车公司买下了西亚特的大部分股份，与另一合资者－西班牙政府共同经营西亚特汽车公司，使西亚特属于大众汽车公司的子公司。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll take it. I deserved that seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我吧，那座位是我应得的。

yingyinNormal.en: I think this seat has my name on it, actually.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我的名字好像是在这个座位上。

yingyinNormal.en: Here are your tickets. Find the seat with your number on it. Here's my seat. Number Five. Six. Seven. Eight. Nine. Ten.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些是你们的票，你们按照票上的座位号按号入座。这是我的座位，我是五号。我是六号！我是七号！八号！九号！十号！

yingyinNormal.en: Sure. Sure. What's with the chair? You know, you can't always get a seat on the subway, so..
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，椅子怎么了？你知道，有时候在地铁上没有座位。

yingyinNormal.en: Grab it. Grab it. Grab it. Grab it. I get it. I grabbed it. I will move my seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓住机会。抓住机会。我懂了，我抓住机会了。你再这样我换座位了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. I thought it looked better there. And I, and also, it's an extra seat around the coffee table.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，我以为摆那儿会更好看，咖啡桌旁就多了一个座位。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, that's it. I've had enough of this, alright. Gunther, these guys are trying to take our seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，够了，我受够了，好吗？甘瑟这两个家伙，想抢我们的座位。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I can't find it, but I remember that I was in seat 32C because that's my bra size.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哎呀，找不到，不过我清楚记得我的座位号是32 C因为我罩杯号就是这个。

yingyinNormal.en: Here, day one. This was the seat I was going to sit in but didn't because there were cracker crumbs on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看，第一天，这个是我本来要坐的座位但我没坐，因为上面有饼干屑。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you care for my seat as well? Actually, yeah, that'd be great. Well, that's fair, you've had a long trip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要坐我的座位吗？事实上，会很好。很公平，你一路这么远赶来。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, you see, in the winter, that seat is close enough to the radiator so that he's warm, yet not so close that he sweats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，不，不，你看啊，在冬天呢，这个座位与暖气片的距离足够让他保持温暖，但又不会太近以至于出汗。

yingyinNormal.en: $2,500 in cash was found in a Manila envelope on Margot's passenger seat. Was it a runaway fund? Like the lead detective is suggesting, or was it something more?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在玛戈的座位底下发现了装着2500美元的信封。这是出逃资金吗？就像警探暗示的一样，还是另有隐情？

yingyinNormal.en: You're darn right, you wouldn't. No matter where I am, this will always be my spot. Like an embassy in a foreign country, this seat is the sovereign soil of my bottom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大胆刁民，你当然不敢。无论我在哪里，这里永远都是我的专座。就像是那些外国大使馆，这座位永远是我屁股不可分割的一部分。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to admit, I was a little miffed that Claire grabbed the good seat, especially after I gave her such a magical weekend, but I was determined to stay positive. And then it hit me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不得不承认，我有点生气克莱尔居然选择了好座位，特别是我刚给她制造了一个魔幻般的周末，但我决心要保持乐观之后，我突然想到[打中了我]。

yingyinNormal.en: He wasn't in the passenger seat?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没在副驾驶座上吗?

yingyinNormal.en: We still need to fill Jacobs' seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还得找人接替雅各布斯呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Just double-check your seat belts, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请再次检查安全带是否系好。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sitting here because the seat was empty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我坐在这儿是因为这儿有个空位。

yingyinNormal.en: This color? Yes. Exactly. Okay. Have a seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个吗？对。好，请坐。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, why don't you just have a seat here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们何不坐这儿？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: State boards and commissions will be required to set aside 50 percent of board <highlight>seats</highlight> for women by 2022.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各州的董事会和委员会将被要求在2022年之前为女性留出50%的董事会席位。

examination_example.sentence: The same elite women scoop up multiple <highlight>seats</highlight> on a variety of boards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同一位精英女性在不同董事会占据多个席位。

examination_example.sentence: Overall, the idea is to let "states" remain in the driver's <highlight>seat</highlight> for managing the species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，这一想法是让“国家”在管理物种方面占据主导地位。

examination_example.sentence: We have a deep-<highlight>seated</highlight> need to feel good about ourselves and we naturally employ a number of self-enhancing strategies to achieve this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们总是自我感觉良好，这是一种根深蒂固的需求，自然地，我们就使用一些自我提高的策略来实现这一点。

word_usage.usage: seat作动词时，为及物动词，表示“使就座；使落座”时，其后一般接人或反身代词（oneself），如：He seated himself behind the desk. 他坐在书桌后面。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He is now supporting "friendly benches," which are public <highlight>seating</highlight> areas where people are encouraged to go and chat with one another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他现在支持“友好的长椅”，这是一种鼓励人们聊天的公共座位区。

examination_example.sentence: Airlines across the globe integrate various shades of blue in their cabin <highlight>seats</highlight>, and it is no coincidence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球各地的航空公司都在其客舱座椅中融入了各种深浅不一的蓝色，这绝非巧合。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the early cars had two <highlight>seats</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多早期的汽车有两个座位。

word_usage.usage: seat作及物动词，常用be seated或seal oneself/sb.这两种结构。用于这种结构的动词还有dress。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Even soccer fans tend to have a <highlight>seat</highlight> each; gone are the days of thousands standing to watch the match.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就算是足球迷也倾向于每人有一个座位；成千上万人站着观看比赛的日子一去不复返了。

examination_example.sentence: You need a <highlight>seat</highlight> which supports your back and the book should be at the right distance from your eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要一个能支撑你背部的座位，书本应与你的眼睛保持适当距离。

examination_example.sentence: It's better to leave your listeners wishing for more than shifting restlessly in their <highlight>seats</highlight> waiting for your speech finally to end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好让你的听众想要听到更多，而不是在座位上坐立不安地等待你讲完。

examination_example.sentence: Rome's Colosseum was 157 feet tall and had 80 entrances, <highlight>seating</highlight> 50,000 people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗马竞技场高157英尺，有80个入口，可容纳50000人。

word_usage.usage: seat作及物动词，常用be seated或seal oneself/sb.这两种结构。用于这种结构的动词还有dress。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 坐得下…人; 能供给…人座位

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Please be polite and always offer your <highlight>seat</highlight> to people who need it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请保持礼貌，并始终为需要的人让座。

examination_example.sentence: But would you like to sit on a <highlight>seat</highlight> that tell you your weight?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是你想坐在一个能告诉你体重的座位上吗？

examination_example.sentence: I stood up and gave my <highlight>seat</highlight> to him.
Miss Temple told Helen Burns to be <highlight>seated</highlight> in a low arm-chair on one side of the fire place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坦普尔小姐让海伦伯恩斯坐在壁炉一侧的一张矮扶手椅上。

examination_example.sentence: After they were <highlight>seated</highlight>, the mother saw a friend and walked up to greet her, leaving the boy alone in his seat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们坐下后，母亲看到了一个朋友，走上前去跟她打招呼，留下男孩独自坐在座位上。

sense_info_list.zh: 坐得下…人; 能供给…人座位

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>seat</highlight> 14 people and doesn't need a driver．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以坐 14 人，不需要司机。
